message: Let's split it 70-30, I'll take the risk of inflation!
You're taking too much risk, let's play it safe!
Let's meet in the middle, 40-60 is a fair split.
You're still taking too much, I want a better deal!
I'll give you most of it, but I need something to survive!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a little, but I'm taking most!
I'm desperate, take the rest, I'll just barely survive
